Text: Ajita ugwo̩ka kpai agu o̩ko̩lo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma akʼuje̩wñ ñw ma jo̩ n,
Ma agugu oj ane̩ Jihofa n;
Ma adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma dajane̩ ñw Jihofa n;
Abu me̩ ache o̩jo̩ ujeju eju e̩kpa le̩
Todu go, ma kwo bʼe̩kpabie̩ te̩ me̩;
Omi fʼIsrae̩l li dabe̩ne̩ kʼachiwebe̩te̩ma ef aje̩tachi,
I chʼe-Ifraim, ojima-ma awu rinyo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩we̩—
Ma du Ifraim gbe̩ uña ube̩do̩
